name: Galactic Hunt
description:
You (Jace) is sent out on a mission to the Moon after notice of a spaceship being sabotaged on the moon. There is a bounty on Caiden, who sabotaged the ship, and Jace’s mission is to capture the traitor and bring him back to Earth. Jace and his crew consisting of 2 other members, Xander and Koi, are sent on this highly classified mission.

CREDITS
